defaultError.title: Something went wrong, our apologies.
defaultError.detail:
Unfortunately we cannot continue right now. Please try again in a few minutes.

Do you have any questions? Call us or stop by your nearest branch.

notOpen.title: The PRO Business section is currently unavailable.
notOpen.detail:
We are working on improving our services and thus opening products online will be unavailable for a few hours.
Please try again later today.

cancel.title: Do you really want to cancel your application?
cancel.detail: Your application will be cancelled and it will not be possible to return to it or complete it.

idInvalid.title: Unfortunately we do not have up-to-date information from your ID card.
idInvalid.detail: To approve your application we need to update the information from your ID card. You can update it in Smart Banka or visit your nearest branch where we will be happy to update it for you. Then, you can resume the application

id.title: Information does not match?
id.detail: Our apologies, you can't update information during the application process. Cancel the application now. You can update your ID card in Smart Banka or visit your nearest branch where we will be happy to update it for you. Then, you can resume the application.

identificationDisagree.title: Information does not match?
identificationDisagree.detail: Our apologies, you can't update information during the application process. Cancel the application now. You can update your ID card in Smart Banka or visit your nearest branch where we will be happy to update it for you. Then, you can resume the application.

businessDataDisagree.title: The information does not match
businessDataDisagree.detail:
If the information found in ARES does not match, please try entering your Company ID (ICO) again.

 If the Company ID is correct and the information does not match, it will need to be updated in ARES. Contact ARES to make update the information on record, only then we can resume the application. Save the application for later.

tin.title: Is your DIČ/TIN correct?
tin.detail:
Please check if the TIN is correct. The Czech TIN always begins with a two-letter country code where the entity is registered.

TIN = Tax Identification Number used for tax purposes in the United States. Fixed TIN format: XXX-XX-XXXX

income.title: Zkontrolujte a upravte prosím zadaná data
income.detail: Pokud je Váš čistý příjem za minulý rok roven {profitLastYear} CZK, bude Váš Čistý měsíční příjem domácnosti činit minimálně {expectedMonthlyIncome} CZK. Čistý měsíční příjem domácnosti se rovná: Čistý příjem za minulý rok / 12 + měsíční příjmy členů domácnosti

commercialAccount.bulletsHeadline: Benefits of MONETA's PRO Business Account

iconBullets.text: Unlimited ATM withdrawals both domestic and abroad, as well as cash deposits using MONETA ATMs or shared ATMs
All electronic transactions free of charge (incoming and outgoing payments, instant payments and SEPA payments)
Special exchange rates in our Online Currency Exchange
Two debit cards and electronic statements in internet banking free of charge
Smart services and discounts with our partners in Smart Banka and Internet Banka
Personal banker at your service

identificationNumber.title: Enter your Company Identification Number (ICO) to fill out your information
identificationNumber.disclaimer: By entering your IN, we can use it to look up your company in ARES (the Administrative Register of Economic Entities) and automatically fill in your company information.

errors.notAvailableAres: ARES is currently unavailable, please try again later.
errors.notAvailableRes: RES is currently unavailable, please try again later.
errors.notFoundAres:
The entered IN was not found in ARES, please try again.

If your IN is new, it may take several days for it to appear in ARES. Once it is listed in ARES, you can apply again. In that case, save your application for later and come back to it once your IN is listed in ARES. You can check whether your IN is listed in ARES on the ARES website.
errors.notFoundRes:
he entered IN was not found in RES, please try again.

If your IN is new, it may take several days for it to appear in RES. Once it is listed in RES, you can apply again. In that case, save your application for later and come back to it once your IN is listed in RES. You can check whether your IN is listed in RES on the RES website.
errors.unsupportedLegalForm: The entered IN belongs to a legal entity. This application is only for self-employed individuals.
errors.wrongBusinessName: Your name does not match the information in ARES. If the information in ARES is correct, the information needs to be updated on our end. You can do so in Smart Banka or any of our branches. Save this application and complete it later (within the next 14 days).
errors.birthDateMismatch: The date of birth does not match the date of the birth of the person listed under the IN.

businessData.title: Does your business information match the information in ARES?
businessData.info: Your information was pulled from Ares, the public database of companies.

contactData.title: Is this your contact information?
contactData.phoneFooter: This number will be used to send Mobile Keys, sign agreements, and other updates about your application.
contactData.emailFooter: Click here to change the email address.
contactData.emailSheetMessage: This email will be set contact email for your business banking. If you wish to use one email address for both personal and business banking, you can easily update it in Settings of the appropriate internet banking.
contactData.unsecuredCommunicationConsentDescription: I consent to regular, unencrypted communication via phone and email. More

I agree that the members of the MONETA Group (MONETA Money Bank, a.s., IN: 25672720, MONETA Auto, s.r.o., IN: 60112743, MONETA Leasing, s.r.o., IN: 60751606 a MONETA Stavební Spořitelna, a.s., IN: 47115289) may use regular means of communication, i.e.  unencrypted electronic and SMS messages, which may contain information about my person and the content of agreements concluded with members of the MONETA Group.
contactData.unsecuredCommunicationConsentWhatsAppDes: I consent to unencrypted communication with MONETA via WhatsApp and other messaging apps More

I agree that the members of the MONETA Group (MONETA Money Bank, a.s., IN: 25672720, MONETA Auto, s.r.o., IN: 60112743, MONETA Leasing, s.r.o., IN: 60751606 a MONETA Stavební Spořitelna, a.s., IN: 47115289) may use regular means of communication via WhatsApp, or other instant messaging platforms, with messages which may contain information about my person and the content of agreements concluded with members of the MONETA Group. The list of currently used instant messaging platforms is available at moneta.cz/kontakt/souhlas-aplikace. The MONETA group will communicate with me using the phone numbers +420 224 443 636 and +420 728 133 133.
contactData.footer: By continuing, I agree that information regarding the arrangement of a Business PRO Account may be sent on a one-time basis in an unencrypted manner to the email address and phone number listed above. I further acknowledge the Privacy Policy of the MONETA Group.

taxSection.taxResidenceInfoBody: Enter your business Tax Identification Number for that country.

politicallyExposedPerson.title: Are you a politically exposed person?
politicallyExposedPerson.reasonHint: E.g, “My brother is a judge on the Supreme Court”.

info.title: Politically exposed person
info.subtitle: A politically exposed person is an individual who holds a prominent public position or role in a government body or international organization, either in the Czech Republic or abroad.
info.detail: E.g., Prime Minister, Member of Parliament, prominent head of local government, judge of the Supreme or Constitutional Court, member of the Central Bank's bank board, senior officer of the armed forces etc.
info.bulletsHeadline: A politically exposed person is also any:
bullets: Member of immediate family of said person (e.g., parent, child, sibling, spouse)
Partner or the beneficial owner of the same legal person or trust fund as said person or a person who has any other close business relationship with said person
Beneficiary owner of a legal person or a trust fund created on behalf or for the benefit of said person

additionalData.title: Now just final details:
additionalData.marketingAgreement: I agree to receive information about new or promotional product offers of the MONETA Group. I acknowledge that I can opt-out anytime.

click2Pay.title: Click to Pay has been enabled for your {type} card on the e-shop
click2Pay.detail: Whenever you see the Click to Pay logo {0} while shopping, you can easily pay by entering your email. Your card details are securely stored in the Click to Pay system, which the merchant does not have access to. By proceeding, you agree to the terms of service, which will also be saved in your Documents. You can deactivate this service anytime in Smart Banka.
click2Pay.emailInfo: If you have multiple cards linked to one email address, you will be able to choose which one to use every time you shop.
click2Pay.emailError: We need your email. Please update it in Settings.

campaign.footer: By selecting "Claim Apple iPhone SE 128 GB" I agree that MONETA Money Bank, a.s. may share my data, including: email address, loan registration number, loan drawdown date and loan principal amount, with iStyle CZ, s.r.o., which will process this data for the purpose of delivering the latest Apple iPhone SE 128 GB. I also acknowledge that the Fee for Early Repayment initiated by the Client will increase by 3% of the early-repaid loan principal. The full terms and conditions for receiving the Apple iPhone SE 128 GB can be found here.

commercialAccount.title: PRO Business Account
commercialAccount.detailPlastic: Your new PRO Business Account {accountNumber} will be active by the following business day the latest. The debit card to your new business account will be sent to your address: {address}.
commercialAccount.detailVirtual: Your new PRO Business Account {accountNumber} will be active by the following business day the latest. S You can use your virtual card right after the PRO Business account has been activated. Just add it to your smartphone wallet. Your PIN can be found in 'card detail' in your Smart Banka.
commercialAccount.detailPlasticExpres: The debit card to your new current account will be sent to: {address}
commercialAccount.detailVirtualExpres: The virtual card can be used right away via Google Pay or Apple Pay. You can find ir in your internet banking.

savingsAccount.title: PRO Business Savings Account
savingsAccount.detail: Your new PRO Business Savings Account {accountNumber} will be active by the following business day the latest.

expres.title: Express Business Loan
expres.detailWithInsurance: {loanAmount} will be credited by the following business day to your account {accountNumber}. The first repayment {installmentAmount} including insurance premium will be automatically deducted on {firstInstallmentDate}.
expres.detailWithoutInsurance: {loanAmount} will be credited by the following business day to your account {accountNumber}. The first repayment {installmentAmount} will be automatically deducted on {firstInstallmentDate}

flexi.title: Overdraft - MiniFlexi Business
flexi.detail: The available balance in your account {accountNumber} will be increased by {amount} by the following business day the latest.

cc.title: Credit Card - MONETA Business Card
cc.detail: Credit card with a limit of {amount} will be delivered within 5 business day to {address}. You can use your card right away via GooglePay, ApplePay. For start, we set your basic limits for payments, after you receive and activate the card it can be changed in 'card detail'.

smartBank.title: Smart Banka for Business

internetBank.title: Internet Banka for Business
internetBank.detail: As soon as you're verified, we will send you an email with instructions on how to log in to internet banking for the first time.

campaign.title: Apple iPhone SE 128 GB
campaign.detail: iStyle will send you an email within 5 business days a unique code which can be used to order the latest Apple iPhone SE 128 GB. The code can be used to order the device FOR FREEA on iStyle.cz by {codeValidity}.

loginDetail.info: You will log in to the Internet Banking for business/b> using these new login details. Your current login credentials for Internet Banking for non-business users remain unchanged.

promo.title: Promotion: 5 % for fuel
promo.detail: Complete information about this promotion can be found at MONETA Business Card.

debitCard.title: Debit card type
plasticCardBullets: You will receive the plastic card together with instructions on how to set your PIN and activate the card.
You can find your payment card and the PIN in Internet Banka and use it right away via Google Pay or Apple Pay
virtualCardBullets: Instead of a plastic card, you will be issued a virtual card.
You can find your payment card and the PIN in Internet Banka and use it right away via Google Pay or Apple Pay

commercialAccount.title: PRO Business Account
commercialAccount.detail: When you arrange you also receive for FREE:
bullets: Personal banker at your service
Special exchange rates in our Online Currency Exchange
All electronic transactions free of charge (incoming and outgoing payments, instant payments and SEPA payments)
Unlimited ATM withdrawals both domestic and abroad, as well as cash deposits using MONETA ATMs or shared ATMs
Two debit cards and electronic statements in internet banking free of charge.
Smart services and discounts with our partners in Smart Banka and Internet Banka

marketingAgreementInfo.title: Consent to receive marketing communication
marketingAgreementInfo.detail: I agree to the processing of my personal data, including identification and contact details, information about banking transactions, data generated while using products and services, and other personal data I provide, will provide in the future, or that MONETA Group companies (MONETA Money Bank, a.s., ID: 25672720, MONETA Auto, s.r.o., ID: 60112743, MONETA Leasing, s.r.o., ID: 60751606, and MONETA Stavební Spořitelna, a.s., ID: 47115289) may lawfully obtain, for preparing tailored offers and presenting product or service proposals.

expresCampaign.title: How does it work?
expresCampaign.detail: After the Agreement has been signed, iStyle will send you an email within 5 business days a unique code which can be used to order the latest Apple iPhone SE 128 GB. The code can be used to order the device FOR FREEA on iStyle.cz by {codeValidity}..

expresInterestRate.title: Interest rate
expresInterestRate.detail: The interest rate is based on the information we currently have about you. Once you provide additional business details, the offer will be recalculated, and the final interest rate may differ.

expresCreditworthiness.title: Creditworthiness
expresCreditworthiness.detail: Processing personal data is necessary to assess creditworthiness, reliability, and payment history, including verification in the Banking Client Information Register (BRKI) and Non-Banking Client Information Register (NRKI), as well as other steps required for agreement conclusion.

expresYearInterestRate.title: Annual Interest Rate
expresYearInterestRate.detail: The stated interest rate is fixed for the entire term of the loan agreement.

creditCard.title: How does the credit card work?
creditCard.detail: With the credit card, you get up to {interestFreePeriodDays} days interest-free, during which you can repay either the full balance or a part of it.
bullets: Each month, you can spend up to your credit limit
By {interestFreePeriodPaymentDay} of the following month, pay the full balance or the minimum payment (the rest accrues interest)

perks.title: Benefits of the credit card
perks.detail: No arrangement or maintenance fees. Receive {benefitReward} back for each payment.

dictionary.title: Glossary
bullets: Credit card issuance refers to arranging a revolving loan accessible via the credit card.

Interest-free period is from the 1st day of the month to {interestFreePeriodPaymentDay} of the following month, during which the bank provides credit without interest if the full amount is paid by the due date on the statement.
Billing period is from the 1st to the last day of the calendar month.
Interest rate is the annual interest rate. Funds are charged daily from the date of use, calculated as days in the month/365.
Credit card payment is paying part or all of the used funds. The total payment amount is on your statement and can be paid via bank transfer or automatically with 100% direct debit.

Minimum payment is the amount due by {interestFreePeriodPaymentDay} each month, equal to {minimumMonthlyPaymentPercentage} of the used funds. Automatic debit for the minimum payment is set up for you. You can also pay the full amount via transfer or debit if preferred.

100% direct debit is a free service that automatically pays the outstanding balance during the interest-free period ({interestFreePeriodPaymentDay} of the month), giving you peace of mind. If the full amount isn’t paid by the end of the interest-free period or if a transfer is used, the used funds accrue interest at {interestRate} p.a.
Cash back allows you to withdraw cash at a merchant when paying with your card. The amount is added to the transaction plus a one-time fee of {cashBackFee}.

Credit card payment order works like a one-time transfer from a current account. It allows payments even if the recipient doesn’t accept card payments. This service is charged {paymentOrderFee} of the transfer amount. Interest starts from the next day after execution.
Moneta ATM withdrawals are charged {atmWithdrawalFeeHome} of the withdrawn amount.
Other ATM withdrawals and abroad are charged {atmWithdrawalFeeForeignPercentage} of the withdrawn amount + {atmWithdrawalFeeForeignAmount}.

creditCard.secondaryButton:
Do you have any questions or need assistance ?
Call us at 224 444 555

on.title: Enabled
on.detail: For your convenience, the 100% Direct Debit service automatically pays the outstanding balance during the interest-free period for free, giving you peace of mind.

off.title: Disabled
off.detail: If the outstanding balance isn’t paid within {interestFreePeriodDays} days, the funds will accrue interest at {interestRate} p.a., and we will automatically debit the minimum repayment ({minimumMonthlyPaymentPercentage} of the outstanding balance) each month.

directDebitMaxFree.title: 100 % Direct Debit
directDebitMaxFree.detail: 100% Direct Debit service automatically pays the outstanding balance during the interest-free period for free, giving you peace of mind.

directDebitMin.title: Minimum Direct Debit
directDebitMin.detail: If the outstanding balance isn’t paid within {interestFreePeriodDays} days, the funds will accrue interest at {interestRate} p.a., and we will automatically debit the minimum repayment ({minimumMonthlyPaymentPercentage} of the outstanding balance) each month.

lineOfCredit.title: Non-binding Line of Credit
lineOfCredit.detail: A non-binding line of credit is an agreement under which the bank is willing, but not obliged, to provide funds up to the Flexi Limit agreed in the contract, not exceeding the total credit limit. Any drawdown depends solely on the bank’s decision, regardless of whether the client meets all conditions. The bank may also reduce the Flexi Limit at any time. The client will be informed via Internet Banking or a letter.

flexiLineOfCredit.title: Non-binding Line of Credita
flexiLineOfCredit.detail: A non-binding line of credit is an agreement under which the bank is willing, but not obliged, to provide funds up to the Flexi Limit agreed in the contract, not exceeding the total credit limit. Any drawdown depends solely on the bank’s decision, regardless of whether the client meets all conditions. The bank may also reduce the Flexi Limit at any time. The client will be informed via Internet Banking or a letter.

posSavings.title: How does it work?
posSavings.detail: The total saved amount when applying online includes waived loan fees, waived management fees, and interest savings due to a reduced interest rate compared to the standard branch rate.
